20110104070633.000|20110104070635.000|CC1|PROSECUTORS PLAN TO CALL 30

20110104070646.000|20110104070646.000|CC1|TESTIFY.

20110104070656.000|20110104070659.000|CC1|THE PROSECUTION WILL LAY OUT HIS
20110104070659.000|20110104070700.000|CC1|CASE AGAINST THE DOCTOR,        
20110104070700.000|20110104070702.000|CC1|INTENDING TO PROVE HE ACTED     
20110104070702.000|20110104070702.000|CC1|RECKLESSLY.                     
20110104070702.000|20110104070704.000|CC1|>> THEY HAVE TO SHOW THAT CONRAD
20110104070704.000|20110104070709.000|CC1|MURRY ACT RECKLESSLY WHEN HE    
20110104070709.000|20110104070711.000|CC1|ADMINISTERED THE PROPOFOL AND   
20110104070711.000|20110104070713.000|CC1|THAT CAUSED HIS DEATH.          
20110104070713.000|20110104070714.000|CC1|HE HAS PLEADED GUILTY TO        
20110104070714.000|20110104070715.000|CC1|MANSLAUGHTER CHARGES.           
20110104070715.000|20110104070718.000|CC1|THEY ARE RAISING QUESTIONS WHO  
20110104070718.000|20110104070719.000|CC1|ADMINISTERED THE LETHAL DOSE.   
20110104070719.000|20110104070721.000|CC1|LAST WEEK THEY ALLOWED THE      
20110104070721.000|20110104070723.000|CC1|LAWYERS TO TEST FROM SYRINGES   
20110104070723.000|20110104070725.000|CC1|AND THE INTRAVENOUS DRIP FOUND  
20110104070725.000|20110104070727.000|CC1|IN JACKSON'S HOME AFTER HIS     
20110104070727.000|20110104070728.000|CC1|DEATH.                          
20110104070728.000|20110104070730.000|CC1|THE DEFENSE MAY CENTER ON THE   
20110104070730.000|20110104070731.000|CC1|DISCARDED SYRINGE ON THE FLOOR  
20110104070731.000|20110104070732.000|CC1|IN THE BEDROOM.                 
20110104070732.000|20110104070733.000|CC1|>> ACCORDING TO THE PROSECUTOR, 
20110104070733.000|20110104070736.000|CC1|WHAT THEY ARE GOING TO CLAIM AS 
20110104070736.000|20110104070737.000|CC1|THEIR DEFENSE IS THAT WHEN DR.  
20110104070737.000|20110104070740.000|CC1|MURRAY LEFT MICHAEL JACKSON'S   
20110104070740.000|20110104070741.000|CC1|ROOM, AFTER HE INJECTED HIM WITH
20110104070741.000|20110104070744.000|CC1|A SMALL AMOUNT OF PROPOFOL,     
20110104070744.000|20110104070747.000|CC1|JACKSON, WHO WAS DESPERATE FOR  
20110104070747.000|20110104070749.000|CC1|SLEEP, MAY HAVE TAKEN THAT      
20110104070749.000|20110104070750.000|CC1|SECOND SYRINGE.                 
20110104070750.000|20110104070751.000|CC1|AND INJECTED HIMSELF.
